mapper.select: select * from store where num = #{num} and pw = #{pw}
select s.stock_num, t.item_type, t.item_name, t.item_price, s.amount, t.item_state from stock s join item t on s.item_num = t.item_num
select o.od_num, t.item_name, t.item_price, o.od_time, o.received_not from `order` o join item t on o.item_num = t.item_num
select r.od_num, t.item_name, r.rc_amount, t.item_price, r.rc_time, r.pay from receive r join item t on r.item_num = t.item_num
select rs_num, rs_date, sales, consume from result
select i.item_name, s.amount from stock s join item i on s.item_num = i.item_num where s.num = #{num} order by s.amount limit 6

select r.rs_date, sum((r.sales*p.prod_price)) "maechul", sum((r.consume*i.item_price)) "jichul", (sum((r.sales*p.prod_price))-sum((r.consume*i.item_price))) "income" from result r left join product p on r.prod_num = p.prod_num left join stock s on r.stock_num = s.stock_num left join item i on s.item_num = i.item_num where r.num = #{num} group by r.rs_date;
